CustomField.description:

E2B (R3): D.7.1.r.3 Continuing E2B (R3): D.10.7.1.r.3 Continuing Conformance: Optional Data Type: Boolean OID: None Value Allowed: false true nullFlavor: MSK, ASKU, NASK
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Indicates if the ‘medical condition’ is known to be still present at the time of this report.
CustomField.label: Continuing?
